post.text: "No matter how daunting the odds, she never—ever—quits. That is the Hillary I know." —President Obama

comment.author: Devon
comment.text: We do not take anyone for granted, but it is safe to say Hillary Clinton is going to be our next president. Now, we need to make sure we take the Senate and the House. Make Red States Blue Now. Give the money to democrat candidates across the board so we can get congress working again for the American people. Warning, if we do not do this we will have a do nothing congress again. I know you don't want this.

replies.author: Kerri
replies.text: I pray for our Country if that should happen.

replies.author: Jordan
replies.text: I am taking a big stinky dump right now.

replies.author: Brittany
replies.text: Reading these crude comments from Trump supporters is enough inspiration to get out the vote for our champion, Hillary!

replies.author: Derek
replies.text: I feel for those who once were proud democrats...the real honest majority who supported the process only to have the few steal their right to be heard...now they must support someone racked with dishonest controversy...now they must, " all hail hillary, queen of the criminal party..."can the democratic party live on???only when they give up the queen thing ....just sayin'...
